snippet.title: Raccoon Lagoon Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to the Oculus Quest and RiftS July 25, 2019

More info at: http://www.hiddenpath.com/game/raccoonlagoon/

Quest: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/1903584373052985
Rift: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1714408811965644

Details about the game:
A group of adorable sailors have been marooned on your shore.  Let's help them build a home here. And just maybe, they can help us repair the island's broken heart.  Explore the eight beautiful and distinct climates of the island, and with fishing, cooking, farming, mining, painting, themed decorations, and many hours of story quests, you won't run out of things to do.  You can invite a friend if you wish, just make sure to watch out for the Raccoons!
